verses.text: He \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* also in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Cause them that have \w charge|strong="H6486"\w* over the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, even every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add with\add* his \w destroying|strong="H4892"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And, behold, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w higher|strong="H5945"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, which \w lieth|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* a \w slaughter|strong="H4660"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them \add was\add* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, with a \w writer’s|strong="H5608"\w* \w inkhorn|strong="H7083"\w* by his \w side|strong="H4975"\w*: and they went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft which lieth: Heb. which is turned\f*\f + \fr 9.2 \ft a slaughter…: Heb. a weapon of his breaking in pieces\f*\f + \fr 9.2 \ft by his…: Heb. upon his loins\f*

And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, whereupon he was, to the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, which \add had\add* the \w writer’s|strong="H5608"\w* \w inkhorn|strong="H7083"\w* by his \w side|strong="H4975"\w*;

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, through the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w set|strong="H8427"\w* a \w mark|strong="H8420"\w* upon the \w foreheads|strong="H4696"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w sigh|strong="H0584"\w* and that \w cry|strong="H0602"\w* for all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft set a mark: Heb. mark a mark\f*

¶ And to the \w others|strong="H0428"\w* he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in mine \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*, \w Go|strong="H5674"\w* ye \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him through the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w*: let not your \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither have ye \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*:\f + \fr 9.5 \ft mine hearing: Heb. mine ears\f*

\w Slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w utterly|strong="H4889"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \add and\add* \w young|strong="H0970"\w*, both \w maids|strong="H1330"\w*, and little \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: but come not \w near|strong="H5066"\w* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* upon whom \add is\add* the \w mark|strong="H8420"\w*; and \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* at my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*. Then they \w began|strong="H2490"\w* at the \w ancient|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft utterly: Heb. to destruction\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* with the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*: go ye \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*. And they went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, while they were \w slaying|strong="H5221"\w* them, and I was \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, that I \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H2199"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! wilt thou \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* all the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in thy pouring \w out|strong="H8210"\w* of thy \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, The \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w perverseness|strong="H4297"\w*: for they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* not.  +  r 9.9  t full of blood: Heb. filled with, etc *  +  r 9.9  t perverseness: or, wresting of judgment *

And as for me also, mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither will I have \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*, \add but\add* I will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* upon their \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

And, behold, the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, which \add had\add* the \w inkhorn|strong="H7083"\w* by his \w side|strong="H4975"\w*, \w reported|strong="H7725"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* as thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft reported…: Heb. returned the word\f*
